name: RunYUNIQLCLI
description: Runs database migrations with YUNIQL CLI using version acquired from previous task.
helpMarkDown: This runs database migration with yuniql-cli
author: Rodel E. Dagumampan

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of YUNIQL CLI. If omitted, the latest version of yuniql-cli is installed. Visit the [releases](https://github.com/rdagumampan/yuniql/releases) to get an appropriate version.

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: Database connection string
inputs.helpMarkDown: The connection string to your target database server.

inputs.name: workspacePath
inputs.label: Target workspace directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of your version directories to run.

inputs.name: targetPlatform
inputs.label: Target platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target database platform. Default is SqlServer.

inputs.name: autoCreateDatabase
inputs.label: Auto-create target database
inputs.helpMarkDown: When true, creates and configure the database in the target server for yuniql migrations.

inputs.name: targetVersion
inputs.label: Target version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum target database version to run to.

inputs.name: tokenKeyValuePair
inputs.label: Token key/value pairs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Token key/value pairs for token replacement.
